ABOUT_HYDRANT: This is a bachelor project at Chalmers University of Technology
A_PLATFORM: A code testing platform for students and teachers
BY_AUTHORS: - A bachelor Thesis 2023 by Alex, Alfred, Erik, Malte, Sebastian and Gabster
A_code_testing_platform_for_teachers_and: A code testing platform for teachers and students
A_PLATFORM_TEXT: Hydrant can automate the process of code testing for teachers and students. Our platform provides an easy-to-use interface for teachers to create and upload assignments, including unit tests, for students to complete. Students can then submit their code, which is automatically tested against the uploaded unit tests providing immediate feedback and enabling a more efficient and productive learning experience.
Catch_And_Prevent_Text: By testing the code, it is possible to catch and prevent errors early in the development process. This avoids the need to rework code and fix errors later on.
Improving_code_quiality_and_reliability_: Ensuring that the code is tested properly and behaves as intended you can improve the overall quality and reliability of your software.
Enhancing_maintainability_and_scalabilit: Having a suite of tests that cover various scenarios and use cases, you can make changes to your code with more confidence and avoid introducing new bugs or issues.
